list.title: 450-free-courses
list.description: Here are 450 Ivy League courses you can take online right now for free.

list.title: Fighting COVID-19 with Epidemiology
list.description: This free Teach-Out is for anyone who has been curious about how we identify and measure outbreaks like the COVID-19 epidemic and wants to understand the epidemiology of these infections.

list.title: RxCovea Journal Club
list.description: RxCovea is a 150 member open Source research group that gives weekly seminars on Covid-19. View the seminars here.
